item.title: 中石化称 2025 年起中国汽油需求将快速下降
item.description: 中国最大的炼油企业表示，中国的汽油需求已于去年达到顶峰，随着向电动汽车转变的步伐加快，汽油需求将加速下降。【原文：China’s biggest oil refiner said the country’s gasoline demand had peaked last year and declines would accelerate as the shift to electric vehicles gathers pace.】

item.title: 策略师称日元前景因日本央行不加息而恶化
item.description: 据策略师称，在日本央行跳过可能的加息之后，日元的前景正在恶化，而央行的经济声明可以被视为有些鸽派。【原文：The yen’s outlook is deteriorating after the Bank of Japan skipped a potential rate hike, while the central bank’s economic statement can be seen as somewhat dovish, according to strategists.】

item.title: 美联储影响亚洲情绪，印度卢比跌至历史新低
item.description: 由于美联储的鹰派评论打压了市场情绪，印度卢比跌破 85 美元兑 1 美元的汇率，创下新低，与大多数亚洲同业一起下跌。【原文：The Indian rupee fell past 85 per dollar to a new low, declining with most Asian peers as hawkish commentary by the Federal Reserve weighed on sentiment.】

item.title: 腾讯因反垄断担忧放弃 Epic Games 董事会席位
item.description: 在美国司法部认为腾讯在 Epic Games 公司董事会中任命的两名董事违反反垄断法后，腾讯控股有限公司解除了这两名董事的职务。【原文：Tencent Holdings Ltd. removed two directors it appointed to the board of Epic Games Inc. after the US Justice Department deemed the positions a violation of antitrust laws.】

item.title: 中国煤炭供应过剩将进一步推动价格下跌
item.description: 冬季来临之际，中国蓬勃发展的煤炭生产远远超过了需求，导致库存膨胀、价格暴跌，分析师预测价格还将进一步下跌。【原文：China’s booming coal production is running well ahead of demand at the onset of winter, leading to swelling inventories and plunging prices that analysts forecast will fall further.】

item.title: 日本央行按兵不动，日元兑美元汇率跌破 155 点
item.description: 日本央行在政策会议上维持利率稳定后，日元兑美元汇率跌破了 155 这一关键水平。【原文：The yen weakened past the key level of 155 versus the dollar after the Bank of Japan kept interest rates steady at its policy meeting.】

item.title: 上田等待下次加息，日本央行按兵不动
item.description: 日本央行维持其货币政策设置稳定，表明鉴于目前的不确定性和通胀超调的可能性不大，日本央行认为目前没有加息的紧迫性。【原文：The Bank of Japan kept its monetary policy settings steady, signaling it sees little urgency to raise interest rates for now given ongoing uncertainties and little chance that inflation will overshoot.】

item.title: 美元升值让印度央行的外汇策略更加棘手
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 中国银行自 2021 年以来首次上调房贷利率
item.description: 由于房地产持续低迷和世界第二大经济体经济放缓拖累了利润空间的缩小，中国的银行三年来首次提高了新的房贷成本。【原文：Chinese banks raised new mortgage costs for the first time in three years, as narrowing margins are dragged down by a persistent property slump and slowdown in the world’s No. 2 economy.】

item.title: Eneos 考虑首次公开发行 JX 高级金属公司最多 70% 的股份
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，日本炼油商 Eneos 控股公司正在考虑出售 JX 高级金属公司多达 70% 的股份，首次股票出售可能会筹集多达约 7000 亿日元（45 亿美元）的资金。【原文：Japanese oil refiner Eneos Holdings Inc. is considering selling as much as 70% of JX Advanced Metals Corp. in an initial share sale that may raise up to around ¥700 billion ($4.5 billion), according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 金融初创公司 Chime 提交首次公开募股机密文件
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，专注于免费银行服务的金融科技公司 Chime Financial Inc.【原文：Chime Financial Inc., a financial technology company focused on no-fee banking services, has submitted a confidential filing with the US government for its initial public offering, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: CATL 考虑在香港第二次上市，筹资至少 50 亿美元
item.description: 当代安派克斯科技有限公司（Amperex Technology Co.据熟悉内情的人士透露，安培瑞斯科技有限公司正在考虑在香港进行第二次上市，可能会筹集至少 50 亿美元的资金，成为自 2021 年初以来香港规模最大的一次上市。【原文：Contemporary Amperex Technology Co. Ltd. is considering a second listing in Hong Kong that could raise at least $5 billion, making it the city’s biggest since early 2021, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美元上涨后中国人民银行提供 7 月以来最强人民币支持
item.description: 在美联储对未来降息持谨慎态度提振美元并使离岸人民币创下一年新低后，中国通过其每日参考汇率加大了对人民币的支持力度。【原文：China ramped up support for the currency via its daily reference rate after Federal Reserve’s caution over future interest rate cuts boosted the dollar and sent the offshore yuan to a fresh one-year low.】

item.title: 新西兰企业自营交易乐观预示未来复苏
item.description: 澳新银行（ANZ Bank）的一项调查显示，新西兰企业对自身贸易前景的乐观情绪在12月份升至10年来的新高，这为2025年经济增长复苏增添了迹象。【原文：Optimism among New Zealand firms about their own trading prospects rose to a fresh 10-year high in December, according to an ANZ Bank survey, adding to signs of a recovery in economic growth in 2025.】

item.title: 美联储鹰派减息令市场震荡，亚洲货币暴跌
item.description: 新兴市场货币周三的跌势延续到了亚洲交易时段，韩元跌至金融危机以来的最弱水平。【原文：The slide in emerging-market currencies on Wednesday extended into Asian trading hours, with the South Korean won falling to its weakest level since the financial crisis.】

item.title: 高通公司首席执行官在许可纠纷庭审中回击 Arm 公司
item.description: 高通公司（Qualcomm Inc.【原文：Qualcomm Inc.’s chief executive officer told a jury that its business suffered when customers were misled by computer-chip designer Arm Holdings Plc about the companies’ licensing agreement for chip technology vital to the electronics ecosystem.】

item.title: 大众汽车即将与工会达成协议，德国汽车厂将继续开工
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，大众汽车公司和工会领导人正接近达成一项协议，在不关闭德国工厂的情况下重组该汽车制造商的同名品牌。【原文：Volkswagen AG and labor leaders are moving closer to an agreement to restructure the automaker’s namesake brand without shuttering factories in Germany, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美联储降息后华尔街交易员匆忙离场
item.description: 在引发金融市场狂热反弹几乎整整一年之后，美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔周三却反其道而行之，在 2025 年对降息持谨慎观点，令投资者大跌眼镜。【原文：Almost exactly one year after sparking a furious rally in financial markets, Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell did the exact opposite on Wednesday, staking out a cautious view on interest-rate cuts in 2025 that stunned investors.】

item.title: 鲍威尔发出信号：美联储的工作重心已坚定地回归通胀
item.description: 美联储官员以连续第三次降息为 2024 年划上了句号，并发出了通胀担忧重回视野的强烈信号。【原文：Federal Reserve officials capped 2024 with a third-straight interest-rate cut and a strong signal that inflation concerns are back in the fore.】

item.title: Berjaya 称马来西亚资源公司退出高铁竞标
item.description: 据马来西亚资源公司（Malaysian Resources Corp）的合作伙伴之一 Berjaya 集团称，该公司已退出竞标吉隆坡与新加坡之间价值数十亿美元的高速铁路项目的财团。【原文：Malaysian Resources Corp. has withdrawn from a consortium that is bidding for a proposed multi-billion dollar high-speed rail line between Kuala Lumpur and Singapore, according to one of its partners, Berjaya Group.】

item.title: 台湾将以房地产和特朗普为首要议题决定关键利率
item.description: 台湾中央银行即将宣布对其关键利率的决定，同时还要权衡火热的房地产市场、通货膨胀以及当选总统唐纳德-特朗普破坏对台湾至关重要的贸易的可能性。【原文：Taiwan’s central bank is set to announce a decision on its key interest rate while it weighs a hot property market, inflation and the potential of President-elect Donald Trump to disrupt trade vital to the archipelago.】

item.title: 埃隆-马斯克挖掘忠实拥护者，为 DOGE 的工作增加人手
item.description: 亿万富翁埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）正求助于自己公司的一位高管、特朗普白宫的一位前官员和其他科技高管，帮助即将上任的政府招聘员工，以削减政府的规模和范围。【原文：Billionaire Elon Musk is turning to an executive from one of his own companies, a former Trump White House official and other tech executives to help hire staff for the incoming administration’s nascent effort to slash the size and scope of government.】

item.title: 美联储引发 9 月以来最严重下跌后，比特币测试 100,000 美元
item.description: 比特币创下三个多月来的最大跌幅，这是美联储对未来降息空间发出更加谨慎信号后投机性投资广泛回撤的一部分。【原文：Bitcoin sank the most in more than three months, part of a wider retreat in speculative investments after the Federal Reserve signaled greater caution about the scope for future interest-rate reductions.】

item.title: 因美联储鹰派和政治风险，韩元跌至2009年以来最低点
item.description: 由于美元走强加上国内政治不确定性，韩元跌至 15 年多来最弱水平。【原文：The South Korean won fell to its weakest level in more than 15 years as a strong dollar combined with domestic political uncertainties to slam the currency.】

item.title: 自由党议员称，逼迫特鲁多下台的运动势头强劲
item.description: 贾斯汀-特鲁多的政治危机正在加深，越来越多的自由党成员公开呼吁加拿大总理让位，在2025年大选前给新领导人一个机会。【原文：Justin Trudeau’s political crisis is deepening, with more members of his Liberal Party publicly calling for the Canadian prime minister to step aside and give a new leader a chance before an election in 2025.】

item.title: 分析师称日本央行可能迟迟不加息，日元面临下滑风险
item.description: 分析师说，日元有进一步下跌的风险，因为日本央行在看到美联储会议后美国股市大跌后，可能不愿在政策会议上发出过于鹰派的声音。【原文：The yen is at risk of further losses as the Bank of Japan may be reluctant to sound too hawkish at its policy meeting after seeing the selloff in US stocks following the Fed, analysts say.】

item.title: 英国政府协助救援泰坦尼克号造船厂哈兰德-沃尔夫（Harland & Wolff
item.description: 一位熟知内情的人士称，英国政府已接近达成一项协议，帮助泰坦尼克号造船厂哈兰德-沃尔夫公司（Harland & Wolff）营救泰坦尼克号。【原文：The UK government is close to a deal to aid in the rescue of Titanic shipbuilder Harland & Wolff, a person familiar with the matter said, despite earlier refusals to do so.】

item.title: 滞胀迫在眉睫，英国央行将放弃降息
item.description: 英国央行可能警告说，2025 年只会逐步降低利率，在今年年底向投资者发出谨慎的信息，因为滞胀、增长乏力和通胀胶着的阴影笼罩着英国经济。【原文：The Bank of England is likely to warn of only gradual interest-rate cuts in 2025, ending the year with a cautious message to investors as the specter of stagflation — anemic growth and sticky inflation — hangs over the British economy.】

item.title: 期权市场图表显示股市暴跌时急于寻求保护
item.description: 美国 500 指数对美联储会议的反应是多年来最糟糕的，随着硝烟散去，股票期权市场的图表显示，随着股票基准下跌近 3%，市场情绪和定位发生了突然转变。【原文：As the smoke clears after the worst S&P 500 reaction to a Federal Reserve meeting in years, charts of equity options markets show a sudden shift in sentiment and positioning as the equity benchmark fell almost 3%.】

item.title: 禽流感和大流行恐惧须知
item.description: 对于流感病毒来说，不完美就是优势。它们会不断变异，产生新的病毒株，挑战免疫系统对抗早期病毒的能力。正因为如此，流感对人类和易受其感染的动物物种（主要是鸟类）构成了终生威胁。【原文：For influenza viruses, imperfection is a strength. They constantly mutate, producing new strains that challenge immune systems primed to fight earlier varieties. That’s what makes flu a life-long threat to humans and the animal species — mainly birds — that are vulnerable to it.】
